convo.name: Aleksander
convoPiece: Hello again, --------! I’m glad you found your way to the Pile Gate.
Just through here is the Stradun, the main street of Dubrovnik.It’s usually busy, as fitting a trade town, so keep your eyes up!
You wouldn’t want to walk into a stranger!
We’re going to walk down the Stradun to the Church of St. Blaise. The Archbishop will be waiting there for us.

convo.name: Aleksander
convoPiece: Tacos are my favorite type of sandwich.

convo.name: Aleksander
convoPiece: Have you heard of the tale of Darth Taco the delicious?
It's not a story the Salsarita employees would tell you. It's a Chipotle legend.
Darth Taco had such a knowledge of the TexMex that he could keep the ones he cared about from being eaten.
Ironic, he could save others from being savored and enjoyed, but not himself.
